reviews.review_msg: Worst TA of my life. Not interesting and has no interest in teaching the class. Rambles on about who knows what. Classes very awkward. Always would be eating/drinking, often coming late to go to renissence/vending machine. Hard to keep focused in discussion. Material is interesting but somehow she sucked out all the good. Failure.

She is the absolute WORST TA ever. She didn't care about the students as she arrived to class late every day. She is always sloppy. Explanations were terrible and she was often lazy and even admitted it to us. She is awful at clarifying what was taught in class. Lots of small group discussion and did not get involved, instead she origamied.
